Repack Notes:
=============

One week ago the developer released a build that wasn't working on most PC
configurations. With this comes our repack, the game now runs stable
without any crashes. A new issue has been found though.  Occasionally you
may need to click your mouse button to continue on the loading screens
faster, even though there is not a visable indicator. We don't know if the
developer wanted this or will fix it, but we find it acceptable as long as
your informed.  We apologize that you have to download the game again.


Game information:
=================

DGU is a 3rd person 3D adventure/puzzle game where the player plays  as  a
student of the Death  God  University  studying  to  become  a  death  god
assistant.
Set in a wacky world, DGU takes its inspiration in the old point and click
adventure / puzzle games like Day of the Tentacle or Sam & Max  or  Monkey
Island.
In order to get graduated and pass to the next class, the player needs  to
kill  collect  souls  of  targets  assigned  to  him  by   his   teachers.
To do this, the player needs to gather items and craft deadly traps, decoy
devices    and/or    use    the    environment    to    his     advantage!
There is only one rule! It must look like an accident.


Features:
=========

* Explore the world and find the various items you need to create
  crazy death devices.
* Talk with people to get information, clues and whereabouts of
  your targets.
* Plan carefully your actions to not get seen by innocent
  witnesses.
* Avoid collateral damages.
* Use the weaknesses of your targets against themselves.
* Fulfil the parameters of your assignment to get the best grade
  from your teachers.


Installation Information:
=========================

* Burn or mount
* Install
* Play the game

NOTE: As usual, block the game exe in your firewall
